Description: Fragment of undyed cotton cloth, perhaps a furnishing fabric, with scattered brocaded decoration in red, orange, green, dark blue and black wool. Three short bands of two complete lozenges and six interlocking half lozenges: at the top of the fragment, part of a band with three pairs of half lozenges, meeting at the apices and vertical bars between; part of a larger scale motif made up of tiny lozenges arranged by colour in diagonal rows.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
